column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had heard good things about this restaurant; however
column2: I could not have been more disappointed. The service was awful. I called the order in for pick up
column3: but still had to wait 30 min for it. The bartender was nice
column4: but the manager could not even come out in person to meet with me when I had a concern. Food was mediocre at best. Will not be returning when there are so many other better options in Houston.
